text: |Term|Abbreviation|Explanation| |||| |Historic Environment Record||Information services which provide access to details on historic assets and landscapes covering a defined geographic area, held in an on-line database.| |Historic parks and gardens||A collection of designated heritage assets celebrated for their designed landscapes.| |Human scale||The size and scale of buildings and structures which relate well in size to an individual human being and are arranged in a way which makes people feel comfortable rather than overwhelmed.| |Idea stores||These provide traditional library services as well as additional services including IT facilities and places for socialising as well as access to lifelong learning courses.| |Infill development||Development that takes place on vacant or undeveloped sites between other developments and/or built form.|
